text: Part 2A: Female Sex Hormones. A32year-old women visited her family physician because of unexplained weight gain. She explained that she had no recent change in her diet but that she had an increased appetite, and she has never exercised much. She also complains of tiredness and lack of energy to perform daily activities. The doctor performed a number of blood tests to determine the reason for her symptoms. Table 1 below shows the results of her blood tests. Table 1. Blood test results Sl S hormone 38 0.35-5.50 (mIU/L) Human Chorionic
